sentence.Network_en: In this latter situation and would never expect their designers gifted in sesquipedalian locution.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些情况下,设计师从来不需要考虑自己写一个字.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hippopotamus(河马)+monster(怪兽)+sesquipedalian(多音节的)+phobia(厌恶),sesquipedalian中还被多塞了个字母。那河马怪兽是啥意思?没什么特殊含义,放进来就是为了.

list.abs: sesquipecalian orators ; this sesquipedalian way of saying one has no money ., 夸夸其谈的演说者 ; 这种令人厌烦的方式表示一个人没有钱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin sesquipedalis 'a foot and a half long', from sesqui- (see sesqui-) + pes, ped- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. a very long word (a foot and a half long)
1. given to the overuse of long words;

sentences.sentence: "this sesquipedalian way of saying one has no money"

means.word_mean: 2. (of words) long and ponderous; having many syllables;
